power.title: Ambusher's Rage
power.fluff: The ambush drake's throaty roar erupts from your throat as you fling yourself around your wounded enemy in a dizzying set-up for the death blow

section.text: If you are already raging when you use this power, you can choose to either change your rage to Ambusher's Rage or to gain combat advantage against the target if it is bloodied.
Until the rage ends, as a minor action you can shift 2 squares to a space adjacent to a bloodied enemy.

Also, you count an enemy as being flanked if it is bloodied and at least one ally is adjacent to it. If you hit a bloodied enemy with a melee attack, all allies consider the enemy flanked as long as you are adjacent to it.
